https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sj4AcnbunTUmwwP7RXNgnrVcLUK.jpg A police chase cause 13-year-old Nicolas' dad to crash his car and, tragically, got killed in the process while his mother was sent to jail. Upon learning of her 5-year imprisonment sentence, Nicolas and his friend Tanker decide to find some way of getting her out. Breakin' Out
